name: wallcutter
description: A simple electron application to cut wallpaper

All rights reserved." --version-string.ProductVersion=1.0.0 --version-string.FileVersion=1.0.0 --version-string.InternalName=wallcutter --version-string.OriginalFilename=wallcutter --ignore="(\.cache|data|app\/node_modules|app\/src|app\/less)"

author: Khinenw
